root.specsKey: Camera Body, AF-S 18-55mm VR Kit Lens, Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL9a, Quick Charger MH-23, USB Cable UC-E4, Rubber Eyecup DK-20, Camera Strap AN-DC3, Body Cap BF-1A, Eyepiece Cap DK-5, Software Suite CD-ROM, User Manual
Front-curtain sync, Red-eye reduction, Slow sync with red-eye reduction, Slow sync, rear-curtain sync
TTL phase detection by Nikon Multi-CAM 1000 autofocus module with AF-assist (range approx. 0.5-3m); Detection range: -1 to EV (ISO 100 at 20C/68F)

Scene-recognition system compatible 3D color matrix metering (type G and D lenses), color matrix metering II (other CPU lenses), Center-weighted (weight given to 8-mm circle in center of frame) Spot metering (meters 3.5-mm circle centered on selected focus point)
ISO 100 to 1600 in steps of 1 EV, plus HI-1
Single frame shooting mode, Continuous shooting mode: approx. 3fps, Self-timer mode, Delayed remote mode: 2sec delay, Quick-response remote mode
Auto (hybrid control with image sensor and 420-segment RGB sensor) 12 manual modes, preset manual, fine tuning
Single frame shooting mode, Continuous shooting mode: approx. 3fps, Self-timer mode, Delayed remote mode: 2sec delay, Quick-response remote mode
EH-5a AC Adapter (Available Separately; Requires Optional EP-5 AC Adapter Connector; EN-EL9 also Supported)
Warranty of the product is limited to only manufacturing defect on camera body & lens.
2 years Nikon India Warranty and Free Transit Insurance.
Customer needs to carry the product to the nearby Authorized Service Center to get the product repaired or inspected.

Nikon Service Warranty (Local Warranty) does not apply to any of the followings:- Defects or malfunctions caused by damage resulting from improper care, misuse or abuse of this product or operation of this product contrary to the instructions contained in the owner's manual. Damage or defect caused by accident, sand, water or battery leakage. Damage caused during transportation or mail. Damaged caused by any modifications or servicing performed by person(s) other than NIKON AUTHORISED SERVICE FACILITY. Accessories including batteries, charger, AC adaptor and other consumables. Any electronic data loss due to malfunctioning or repair of this product. Any consequential or incidental damages resulting from any breach of warranty, express or implied, applicable to this product. Nikon India New Extended Service Warranty (Local Warranty) does not apply to any of the followings:- Accessories like batteries, charger, USB cable, AV cable, Adapters, strap, etc. are not covered under warranty. Damage caused due to accident, sand, water, dust, fungus, battery leakage, etc are not covered under warranty. Warranty on free gifts is as per the terms of their respective manufactures, and this warranty does not extend to such gifts. Warranty does not cover the replacement of Product. Warranty does not cover any special, consequential or incidental damages arising in way due to malfunction of the Product such as loss of photography, loss of data, use, profits, or costs and expenses, etc.
Eye-level penta-Dach mirror type; built-in diopter adjustment (-1.7 to .5m-1)
Eye-level penta-Dach mirror type; built-in diopter adjustment (-1.7 to .5m-1)

Have used this camera for about 2 years now. The best camera for first time DSLR users. A very good in-built guide to get your first pictures right plus a host of modes for various shooting scenarios. The 18-55 lens is quite adequate for both wide-angle (group photographs) to a decent zoom. The auto-focus function works well in ambient light conditions. The in-built flash is just about adequate for portraits. The camera focus/response is slow in low light conditions and the in-built flash fall short which are the two main issues.The bundled software is excellent.Have not had any complaint with the camera and have never faced a reason to take it to a service center. Overall; an excellent investment which will reap benefits for its owner for many years.

A Great DSLR Entry Camera, Guide Mode is the best thing about it for beginners. 18-55 Kit Lens got a great Clarity for your pictures. Slight Disappointing during night or long Exposure shots, but can be settled with a tripod.GREAT VALUE for Money, at 24K's you must go for it.Got Loads to offer then its competitor CANON EOS 1000D.The Main Drawback of it is NO VIDEO.But you can always go for its upgrade the NIKON D3100 just spending 1K's more.
A great buy and excellent service

The service was great as usual from Flipkart - the camera was delivered within 48 hours of ordering.This is my first DSLR camera, and I think its great for beginners like me. There is a guide mode which is helpful for those who are new to photography and do not understand what settings to use under what circumstances.All in all, I think this is a good buy and I hope to capture many memories.

A good entry level camera..Best feature is its lowest cost but problem is its just 10.2 Mp.. Performance in low light situations are bad even with hi 1.. Apart from that you get the control over image just like any other dslr..Has all d basic features that you need to master as an amateur..

This DSLR is good for beginners only...It is no special..and has very low performance level in low light condition.. Does not have AEB..and lot of features are absent..I will not recommend this camera at all for people who are seriously interested i photography..
